title: Team to create crowdsourced archive of Civil War-era Independence Day documents (Virginia Tech - Virginia ...
text: ( Source : Virginia Tech - Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University ) BLACKSBURG, Va., Oct. 16, 2015 - A Virginia Tech team led by Paul Quigley, the James I . Robertson Jr. Professor in Civil War Studies, has won a National Archives
